{"id":1512907328,"question_id":1472,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1737231754,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1512907328/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Increasing Decreasing String","memory":"10.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string sortString(string s) {//1 <= s.length <= 500\n        string ret;\n        vector<int> count(26, 0);\n        for(char c:s) \n            count[c-'a']++;\n        while(ret.size() < s.size()) {\n            for(int i=0; i<26; i++) {\n                if(count[i]>0) {\n                    ret += 'a'+i;\n                    count[i]--;\n                }\n            };\n            for(int i=25; i>=0; i--) {\n                if(count[i]>0) {\n                    ret += 'a'+i;\n                    count[i]--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"increasing-decreasing-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
